{{html:
<div id="tabbable">
  <h2>My Machine Buckets</h2>
  <table id="machine_buckets_list"  class="table table-striped table-bordered">
    <tr>
      <th>Status</th>
      <th>Name</th>
      <th style="display: none">IP Address</th>
      <th>Memory</th>
      <th>CPU</th>
      <th>Storage</th>
      <th>Number of Data Locations</th>
    </tr>
    <tbody>
      <tr ng-repeat="machine in machines">
        <td>{[machine.status]}</td>
        <td>
          <a ng-href="#/edit/{[machine.id]}">{[machine.name]}</a>
        </td>
        <td style="display: none">{[machine.ip]}</td>
        <td>{[sizes[machine.sizeId].memory/1024]} GB</td>
        <td>{[sizes[machine.sizeId].vcpus]} <ng-pluralize count="sizes[machine.sizeId].vcpus" when="{'one': 'core', 'other': 'cores'}"></ng-pluralize></td>
        <td>{[machine.disksize]} GB</td>
        <td>2</td>
      </tr>
    </tbody>
  </table>
</div>
}}
